description.value: You have a connection to the Outer Planes, allowing you to summon a divine ally. Choose either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Celestial], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Fiend], or another 5th-rank spell capable of summoning an extraplanar creature appropriate to your lineage. Once per day, you can cast the chosen spell as a 5th-rank divine innate spell, but the creature summoned must be from the same category as your own lineage, such as a creature with the angel trait if you are an angelkin.
